quote: What great thing would you attempt, if you knew you could not fail.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: It’s not about money or connections. It’s the willingness to outwork and outlearn everyone when it comes to your business.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal; it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
author: Wesley Snipes

quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you’ll land among the stars.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. IT DOES.
author: William James

quote: Always take another step. If this is to no avail take another, and yet another. One step at a time is not too difficult.
author: Og Mandino

quote: If you can’t fly, then run, if you can’t run then walk, if you can’t walk then crawl, but whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
